modDesc.changeLog:
Issues - [KNOWN ISSUE] Multiplayer is not yet supported - [KNOWN ISSUE] A 'Follow Me'-controlled vehicle cannot yet "see / understand" obstacles in front of it (i.e. other vehicles, equipment, trees etc.) and will therefore crash into them - [WONT FIX] When FollowMe is active, it is not possible to control attached equipment - Some translations are probably wrong
Changelog 1.3.0.4: - Hiding the HUD-text after 5 seconds. Player must issue another 'Follow Me'-input-action to vehicle for displaying HUD-text again. - Fix/work-around for making a follower-combine NOT stop at headlands/turning, due to its cutter detecting 'no more crops' to harvest.
Changelog 1.2.0.3: - "Quick-tap" keys activation threshold changed to '1/3 second' (was previously '150 ms') - Attempt at obstacle/collision detection
Changelog 1.1.0.2: - Fix for causing error: "/specializations/Plow.lua(680) : attempt to compare number with nil"
Changelog 1.0.1.1: - Upgraded to FS19 - As per ModHub Team certification report request, have reduced to only using 'EN'-title, due to using same title-name for all languages

description.en:
Currently only for Singleplayer -- Attention
Ever wanted to have some vehicles follow you around the map? With "Follow Me" you can (though not backwards driving).
Issues - [KNOWN ISSUE] Multiplayer is not yet supported - [KNOWN ISSUE] A 'Follow Me'-controlled vehicle cannot yet "see / understand" obstacles in front of it (i.e. other vehicles, equipment, trees etc.) and will therefore crash into them - [WONT FIX] When FollowMe is active, it is not possible to control attached equipment - Some translations are probably wrong Changelog 1.1.0.2: - Fix for causing error: "/specializations/Plow.lua(680) : attempt to compare number with nil"
